questions.question_text_1: Which of the following statements about additive distance matrices are true?
question_texts: Which of the following statements about additive distance matrices are true?

options.option_text: Every 3 x 3 distance matrix is additive.
Every 4 x 4 distance matrix is additive.
There exists a 3 x 3 distance matrix that is not additive.
There exists a 4 x 4 distance matrix that is not additive.
For every additive distance matrix, there exists a simple tree fitting the matrix.
